description:
The game is a blast, and the graphics are absolutely stellar. I play this every day!

The problem is that the game lags behind Linux desktop updates and such, sometimes failing because the version of mesa is too new for the game, etc.

I suggest anyone who tries this game out to check the description in regards to gamescope. Since gamescope is what decides how the game has its output, since WarThunder doesn't have WayLand support (because they lag behind).

Until WarThunder runs with no problems on linux, the game will remain a 4/5 for me always.
summary: Great game, But Linux support could be improved

description: This game looks great from the screenshots, but it took over an hour to download files for the game. When I launched the game, the screen was filled with green pixels. You could barely make out any button to press on the game. I could barely see any shapes on the screen, and looking at them hurt my eyes. I think this game would be really fun and functional if the graphics worked.
summary: Looks good, but may not function
